name: Gift Explorer
description:
HAPPY NEW YEAR 2021

Gift Explorer is a game made to celebrate the new year 2021, it is an event in a Hashtag called #ทำเกมข้ามปี on Facebook.

The game is inspired by the game Mr. Driller, where players have to pierce the dungeon's ceiling in order for the gifts above to fall until we can go in to collect the gifts. And players have to keep the oxygen to fill the air before the breathing air is exhausted.

Players can randomize different characters. Some will have special abilities added. Some of which may make it easier to play, some may be an obstacle to the player.

How to control

(Use Joystick for recommending)

Press 'w' , 'a' , 's' , 'd' for movement. (D-Pad on Joystick)
Press 'h' to jump. (A button on Joystick)
Press 'j' to smash blocks to destroy. (X button on Joystick)
Press 'k' to smash the blocks to make them ruin. (B button on Joystick)

All ability

good for character 

  • Oxygen durability
  • Increased attack range
  • Increase verticle Jump
  • Increase running speed
  • One Shield
  • Breaking a brick
  • Attack while running
  • Max oxygen 120%
  • Star block breaker

Bad for dungeon

  • Increase dropping speed
  • 5 color blocks
  • 6 color blocks
  • Cannot pass the bomb
  • Reduced shaking time

Good for dungeon

  • Big bomb
  • More oxygen capsules
